item.title: Yunus urges religious leaders to help create election awareness
item.description: Chief Advisor Muhammad Yunus has urged religious leaders to help raise awareness about the parliamentary polls and referendum scheduled for Feb 12. He made the call while meeting the leaders of the Christian community on Christmas Eve on Wednesday evening at the State Guest House Jamuna. The Chie

item.title: Social Islami Bank’s administrator team meets branch managers, operation managers, sub-branch chiefs
item.description: An exchange of views meeting between the Administrator Team of Social Islami Bank and the Branch Managers, Operation Managers, and Sub-Branch In-charges was held on 22 December 2025. According to a press release, the meeting was conducted via the Zoom platform from the bank’s Head Office. B

item.title: Pubali Bank holds its 1500th board meeting
item.description: Pubali Bank PLC, one of the leading private commercial banks of Bangladesh, on Wednesday held its 1500th Meeting of the Board of Directors, marking a significant milestone in the bank’s long-standing tradition of strong corporate governance, regulatory compliance, and strategic leadership. item.title: Manon becomes Champion in MTB International Master’s Chess Tournament at IUB
item.description: Bangladesh’s highest rated International Master (IM) Manon Reja Neer has become Champion in the MTB International Masters Chess Tournament, held at Independent University, Bangladesh (IUB) on December 14-23, 2025. The 10-day international tournament, which featured three International Master

item.title: Modhumoti Bank holds 92nd meeting of its board of directors
item.description: The 92nd Meeting of the Board of Directors of Modhumoti Bank PLC was held on Wednesday, according to a press release. item.title: Jamuna Bank signs corporate deal with Best Western Plus Bay Hills, Cox’s Bazar
item.description: Jamuna Bank PLC has signed a corporate agreement with Best Western Plus Bay Hills, Cox’s Bazar on December 9, 2025 at Jamuna Bank Tower, Gulshan-1, Dhaka, according to a press release. The agreement was formally signed by Noor Mohammed, Deputy Managing Director & CBO of Jamuna Bank PLC, and

item.title: Riaz named chief coordinator for voter awareness drive
item.description: Ali Riaz, special assistant to the chief advisor with the rank of advisor, has been appointed chief coordinator for public awareness campaigns on the parliamentary polls and referendum. item.title: IFIC Bank holds awareness workshop on AML, CFT compliance for board members
item.description: IFIC Bank PLC organized an Awareness Workshop on Anti Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism AML and CFT compliance for the members of the Bank’s Board of Directors on December 21, 2025. item.title: EBL wins ICMAB Bronze Award
item.description: Eastern Bank PLC (EBL) has won the Bronze Award in the Private Commercial Bank category at the ICMAB Best Corporate Award 2025, in recognition of its significant contribution to the banking sector and the national economy, according to a press release. The award was formally presented by Sk. Bashi

item.title: BRAC Bank, Pragati Life reward Bancassurance campaign winners with air tickets
item.description: BRAC Bank has recognised the top performers of its bancassurance campaign, ‘Cholo Bidesh’. The campaign was conducted in strategic partnership with Pragati Life Insurance PLC, according to a press release. The initiative marked a notable milestone in BRAC Bank’s growing bancassur

item.title: N’ganj child killed for screaming during ‘attempted rape’: Police
item.description: A fifth-grader in Narayanganj’s Bandar Upazila has been abducted and strangled to death after she screamed while resisting an attempted rape, police say. Bandar Police chief Golam Muktar Ashraf said one of the three arrested suspects gave a confessional statement under Section 164 on Wednesd

item.title: AB Bank opens its sub-branch at Kankirhat
item.description: AB Bank PLC inaugurated its Kankirhat sub-branch on December 24, 2025, as the 60th sub-branch of the bank.
